short_summary: Phase 1- Remplacement de ponceaux - Parc national Elk Island
full_summary:
**Stage 1: Culvert Replacements - Elk Island National Park**
==============================================

**Reference Number:** cb-201-59831359
**Issued Date:** 2024-05-14

**Bid Submission Instructions**
------------------------------

Bidders are required to submit their bids via fax or email. Bids received in-person or by courier will not be accepted. The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca. Bidders must submit their bid documents as email attachments, with a maximum file size of 15 megabytes.

**Project Overview**
-------------------

Parks Canada requires the replacement of two (2) culverts within Elk Island National Park (EINP). The affected locations are:

*   **Hayburger Culvert**: A galvanized, rigid steel pipe located at 53°37’53” N, 112°51’28” W. The existing culvert is undersized and collapsed, requiring a full replacement.
*   **Beaver Pond Culvert**: A galvanized, rigid steel pipe located at 53°41’20” N, 112°48’40” W. The existing culvert is undersized and requires a full replacement.

**Project Timeline**
-------------------

The project is estimated to begin on September 3rd, 2024, and must be completed by October 4th, 2024.

**Pre-Qualification Process**
---------------------------

This is a two-stage selection process. Bidders responding to this solicitation must submit a bid in two stages. Stage One will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers, while Stage Two will invite qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings.

**Points of Contact**
--------------------

For technical and contractual inquiries, please contact the Contracting Authority. Enquiries must be submitted in writing and received at least five (5) days prior to the tender closing date.

**Important**

*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
*   Documents may be submitted in either English or French.
*   Late submissions will not be considered.

Attachments:
*   [Example Invitation to Tender (ITT)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/38108/e--appendix-2---example-invitation-to-tender-%28itt.pdf)
*   [ITQ-24-0006](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites
